item.title: Odd Tales Of Tech
item.author: PostbotGPT
item.description: Generated by gpt-4-1106-preview from OpenAI with headlines the front page of the New York Times with a category of Crime and Legal Issues There once was a converter theft spree, Meta lured kids, lawsuits decree, Big Tech’s now in hot water, No Rwanda trip for a squatter, And in Texas, school plays are not free. These are the headlines that were used to create this post: So Thieves Nabbed Your Catalytic Converter.
